blogs.title: The Conservatives will not ‘suspend’ the House of Lords, but neither will they reform it
blogs.summary: The government’s plans to cut tax credits might just be threatened with a ‘fatal motion’ in the House of Lords today. Unnamed ministers have threatened peers in turn with suspension. Richard Reid explains how the Lords can get i

author.name: Democratic Audit UK
author.description: Democratic Audit monitors democracy and freedom in Britain through a major blog, a series of democracy assessments, reports, commissions and evidence to Parliament

blogs.title: The House of Lords’ powers on statutory instruments survive
blogs.summary: In the long age of abortive Lords reforms, Theresa May has installed a new chapter by backing off from her predecessor’s plans to strip the upper House of its power to vote down statutory instruments – the main form of delegated legislation vit
